update.description:
Added a LogVideoRecorder system that automates the process of generating video recordings from playback.

I added a `example/scripts/log_video_recorder` demo to show how to use the system, see the `README.md` file for instructions on how to run the demo. One .mp4 video will be created by entity specified \(through name or region\). The system params are described in[LogVideoRecorder.hh](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/c9d1efef4338f324cca12267e8d2a2f87b7556ab/src/systems/log_video_recorder/LogVideoRecorder.hh#lines-39)
update.title: Add log video recorder

update.title: Add log video recorder

content.raw: This has been running for four days on 6 computers without failure. Feel free to merge this when ready.
content.html: This has been running for four days on 6 computers without failure. Feel free to merge this when ready.

update.description:
Added a LogVideoRecorder system that automates the process of generating video recordings from playback.

I added a `example/scripts/log_video_recorder` demo to show how to use the system, see the `README.md` file for instructions on how to run the demo. One .mp4 video will be created by entity specified \(through name or region\). The system params are described in[LogVideoRecorder.hh](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/c9d1efef4338f324cca12267e8d2a2f87b7556ab/src/systems/log_video_recorder/LogVideoRecorder.hh#lines-39)
update.title: Add log video recorder

content.raw:
I added an `exit_on_finish` param that auto exits ign-gazebo when recording ends. [429b9cf](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/429b9cfc63d033564eefd0b735c5ecf52d8e49f1)

The demo world file and script are also updated to use this param.

It works with a short state.tlog that I have been using for testing. I’ll now test with the longer state.tlog I got from you.
content.html:
I added an exit_on_finish param that auto exits ign-gazebo when recording ends. 429b9cf

The demo world file and script are also updated to use this param.

It works with a short state.tlog that I have been using for testing. I’ll now test with the longer state.tlog I got from you.

content.raw:
I encountered this error, which I haven't seen before. 

```
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'zmq::error_t'
  what():  Too many open files
timeout: the monitored command dumped core
```
content.html:
I encountered this error, which I haven't seen before.

  what():  Too many open files
timeout: the monitored command dumped core

content.raw: I didn't see that. Two MP4 were generated though, one for each of the robots.
content.html: I didn't see that. Two MP4 were generated though, one for each of the robots.

content.raw:
hmm do you remember seeing this message in console?   
`Detect video recording ended. Shutting down playback`
content.html:
hmm do you remember seeing this message in console?
Detect video recording ended. Shutting down playback

content.raw:
I found that the `record_one_run.bash` script did not end for me. I was recording a video of a SubT log file that had two robots, X2a and X2b. I see the following output:

```
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:401] Following entity: X2a
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:423] Recording video tmp_video_recording.mp4
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:384] Play log 

...

end of log file reached 
end time 3715
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:427] Stopping video recorder
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:375] Rewind Playback 
[Dbg] [SimulationRunner.cc:208] Rewinding simulation back to time zero.
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:401] Following entity: X2b
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:423] Recording video tmp_video_recording.mp4
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:384] Play log 
end of log file reached 
end time 3715
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:427] Stopping video recorder

[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:375] Rewind Playback 
[Dbg] [SimulationRunner.cc:208] Rewinding simulation back to time zero.
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:333] Finish Recording
```

Gazebo keeps running after the "Finish Recording" message. The output of `ign topic -e -t /log_video_recorder/status` is: `data: "end"`.
content.html:
I found that the record_one_run.bash script did not end for me. I was recording a video of a SubT log file that had two robots, X2a and X2b. I see the following output:

[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:401] Following entity: X2a
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:423] Recording video tmp_video_recording.mp4
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:384] Play log 

...

end of log file reached 
end time 3715
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:427] Stopping video recorder
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:375] Rewind Playback 
[Dbg] [SimulationRunner.cc:208] Rewinding simulation back to time zero.
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:401] Following entity: X2b
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:423] Recording video tmp_video_recording.mp4
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:384] Play log 
end of log file reached 
end time 3715
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:427] Stopping video recorder

[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:375] Rewind Playback 
[Dbg] [SimulationRunner.cc:208] Rewinding simulation back to time zero.
[Dbg] [LogVideoRecorder.cc:333] Finish Recording

Gazebo keeps running after the "Finish Recording" message. The output of ign topic -e -t /log_video_recorder/status is: data: "end".

update.description:
Added a LogVideoRecorder system that automates the process of generating video recordings from playback.

I added a `example/scripts/log_video_recorder` demo to show how to use the system, see the `README.md` file for instructions on how to run the demo. One .mp4 video will be created by entity specified \(through name or region\). The system params are described in[LogVideoRecorder.hh](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/c9d1efef4338f324cca12267e8d2a2f87b7556ab/src/systems/log_video_recorder/LogVideoRecorder.hh#lines-39)
update.title: Add log video recorder
